desc: Former world downhill record holder, CB Vaughan Jr, Launched CB Sports Apparel in 1969 and brought color to the mountain. The company reigned as one of America’s leading ski apparel and outerwear brands for over 30 years and is now back better than ever.

layout.text: CB Sports is back! The legend has returned, bringing the effortless, cool vibe of fashion and skiing’s most epic era to the streets and ski slopes of the twenty-first century.
